knimeNode.name: LOFStatistics
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node generates statistics for annotated LoF variants.

fullDescription.intro:
This node generates tab separated statistics for annotated variants. The standard statistic comprises the following fields: chr, pos, rsId (if available), ref_allele, alt_allele. Furthermore, it contains a comma separated list of affected gene ids and symbols, transcript ids and consequences. Consequences are expressed using the following Sequence Ontology terms: splice_site_variant (splice_accecptor_variant, splice_donor_variant), stop_gained, frameshift_variant. If a CDS file is provided, the node calculates the effect of a LoF variant. In contrast to partial LoFs, full LoFs affect all transcripts of a gene. Moreover, it is calculated how often each variant is observed in a homozygous/heterozygous state.
Predecessor nodes (not required): Any node that outputs a VCF file.
fullDescription.option:
Select CDS file which can be downloaded here:
http://www.ensembl.org/info/data/ftp/index.html
If this file is not provided, the effect of LoF variants (full or partial) cannot be calculated.

Select the tool that was used to annotate the VCF file. If LOFTEE was used, the standard statistic additionally contains the fields LoF confidence, failed_filters, lof_flags and lof_infos. Further information can be found here:
https://github.com/konradjk/loftee

ports.outPort: Cell 0: Path to LoF statistics file.
